title: Always, Angel
description: A story of paranormal passion from the author of the Big Bad Wolf series. From the New York Times bestselling author of the Big Bad Wolf paranormal romances, a brand-new novella in the world of the Lost Angels. For millennia, the archangels have searched for their destined mates on earth. Now they are beginning to unite, but for Angel, it is a time of danger and fear. For with the Culmination these unions will bring about, her true nature will finally be revealedâ€”opening her to an impossible desire, and exposing her to the one man she desperately craves,
author: Heather Killough-Walden
